CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(Consumer_Experience_Rating__c = 1, "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(Consumer_Experience_Rating__c = 2, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(Consumer_Experience_Rating__c = 3, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(Consumer_Experience_Rating__c = 4, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF(Consumer_Experience_Rating__c = 5, "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "/img/samples/stars_000.gif" ))))), "Total CER Stars")
CustomField.label: Total CER Stars
